whatMode: What game mode do you want for the match? {{modes}}
whatNumberOfRounds: How many rounds in the match do you want? (Limit: 10)
whatDuration: How long is each round? (Minimum: 20 seconds) **PS**: Remember, valid durations look like this: *20 seconds or 20s*

errors.invalidMode: Oh no, the game mode you entered is invalid! Please insert one from the list above.
errors.isNaN: Well...it doesn't seem like a number, I think.
errors.roundsLimit: For extremely boring reasons, you cannot start more than 10 rounds as a normal user, if you want more, you can help me with my Patreon! {{patreonURL}}
errors.invalidDuration: Unfortunately, a simple bot like me was not able to know what it means what you entered, is it in seconds, minutes? I do not know! Please enter a valid time.
